#summary Tools and research which are related.

= Related Work =

== Papers == 

 *  P. M. Johnson and H. Kou, [http://csdl.ics.hawaii.edu/techreports/06-02/06-02.pdf Automated Recognition of Test-Driven Development with Zorro], in International Workshop on Software Process Shanghai, China: University of Hawai'i, 2006.
 * F. E. Ritter and J. H. Larkin, "Developing Process Models as Summaries of HCI Action Sequences," Human-Computer Interaction, vol. 9, pp. 345-383, 1994.
 * A.L. Wolf and D.S. Rosenblum, [http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/SPCON.1993.236817 A Study in Software Process Data Capture and Analysis], Continuous Software Process Improvement, Second International Conference on the Software Process, 1993. 




== Tools ==

Software-engineering in-process capture and analysis tools

 * [http://www.hackystat.org Hackystat] ([http://code.google.com/p/hackystat/ new version])
 * [http://6thsenseanalytics.com 6thSenseAnalytics]
 * [http://developer.berlios.de/projects/ec/ ElectroCodeoGram] ([http://openfacts.berlios.de/index-en.phtml?title=ElectroCodeoGram wiki])
 * [http://www.prom.case.unibz.it/ PRO Metrics]
 * [http://empirical.jp/~epm/ Empirical Project Monitor]
 * [http://serl.cs.colorado.edu/serl/process/Balboa Balboa]
 
Some tools that capture information about users as they work.

 * [http://www.rescuetime.com/ RescueTime]
 * [http://www.slifelabs.com SLife]
 * [http://timesnapper.com/ TimeSnapper]
 * [http://www.mamooba.com/tracktime TrackTime]

Some tools that visualize time-series data:

 * [http://www.cs.umd.edu/hcil/patternfinder/ PatternFinder]
 * [http://simile.mit.edu/timeline/ Timeline]
 * [http://timepedia.org Chronoscope]

Tools for doing exploratory sequential data analysis (ESDA):
 * [http://ritter.ist.psu.edu/dismal/dismal.html Dismal]
 * [http://acs.ist.psu.edu/dismal/MacShapa.html MacShapa]
 * [http://www.openshapa.org/ OpenShapa] (in development)
